product_name: REI Mohawk Hat with Chin Strap - Toddler Boys'
long_description: The toddlers' REI Mohawk hat with chin strap features cozy, double-layer earflaps with a rip-and-stick closure for a secure fit. Its warm, breathable fleece dries quickly and insulates even when damp.
short_description: The toddlers' REI Mohawk hat with chin strap features cozy, double-layer earflaps with a rip-and-stick closure for a secure fit. Its warm, breathable fleece dries quickly and insulates even when damp.
